sentences.english: Survey found that more yarn than polyester factory inventory pressure.
sentences.chinese: 調查發現，紗廠比滌綸工廠庫存壓力更大。

sentences.english: He needs to purchase a patch of new spindles for his cotton mill.
sentences.chinese: 他的紗廠需要購買一批新的紡錠。

sentences.english: Earlier, most spinners were holding their hopes to import cotton from India.
sentences.chinese: 早前，大多數紡紗廠希望從印度進口棉花。

sentences.english: In the future, this will help spinning mills to adapt the spinning cans more efficiently to the yarn range produced.
sentences.chinese: 將來，這將有助於紡紗廠生產紗線時有效地利用條筒。

sentences.english: Across the street was a textile mill.
End breakage rate of yarn is a very important index of assessment in spinning factories.
sentences.chinese: 細紗斷頭率是紡紗廠的重要考覈指標。

sentences.english: Spinning mills, which turn raw-cotton into yarn, are caught in a dilemma.
sentences.chinese: 把原棉製作成紗線的紡紗廠目前的處境可謂進退兩難。

sentences.english: The spinning mills in India have been always increasing their production capacity.
sentences.chinese: 印度的紡紗廠一直在增加他們的生產能力。

sentences.english: I want to get to know some mill hands.
sentences.chinese: 我想認識幾個紗廠工人。

sentences.english: Staple fibers arrive at the yarn processing plant in large bales.
sentences.chinese: 棉纖維以棉包的形式被運到紡紗廠。

sentences.english: It'sa name spinner from Domain Tools.
sentences.chinese: 這是從紡紗廠的名稱域的工具。

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zhong1 xin1

definition: to consult and act upon/privately run/commercial
